item.title: Connie add a quote by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle
item.description: "It is a capital mistake to theorize before one has data. Insensibly one begins to twist facts to suit theories, instead of theories to suit facts." -- Sir Arthur Conan Doyle

item.title: Connie add a quote by A.A. Milne
Connie add a quote by Catherine Marshall
item.description: "Some of what I wrote bordered on blasphemy....If there was a God, He would have to be truth. And in that case, candor--however impertinent--would be more pleasing to Him than posturing." -- Catherine Marshall

item.title: Connie add a quote by Joni Eareckson Tada
item.description: "Sometimes God allows what he hates to accomplish what he loves." -- Joni Eareckson Tada
